summary: Mai Shiranui from King Of Fighters in Skyrim !
descriptionHtml:
[color=#a61c00][i][size=6][font=Comic Sans MS]MAI SHIRANUI FROM KING OF FIGHTERS IN SKYRIM ![/font]
[/size][/i][/color]
[size=4][i]This is my take on Mai Shiranui from King Of Fighters franchise. (Dont expect her to llok exactly as in KoF games or anime, this is my own version of this character)[/i][/size]
[size=4]
[i]Current Version.  1.3.1[/i][/size][i]
--------------------------------------
[/i][size=4][i]Version  1.3.1
[/i][i]
Fixed problems with eyes textures (If you still have problem with her eyes textures, it means
that install process went wrong, or something is wrong with your skyrim.
This version of mod was tested on few different PC, and all is working without any
problems. )

Also [color=#ff0000]WARNING - DONT FORGET TO CHECK THE REQUIREMENTS FOR THIS MOD ! ALSO DONT FORGET TO CHECK IF BOTH ESP & ESM FILES ARE CHECKED
IN YOUR SKYRIM LAUNCHER ![/color]
[/i][i]

[/i][i]Features.[/i][i]
-----------------[/i][i]-
-  She is skilled in assassination and master with dual weapons (daggers, swords) and can use long bows.

[/i][i]- Dual Combat Style (she is great with daggers and or swords as well as with long bows)[/i][i]   Dual Flurry, Dual Savagery & Armsman 60% - perks.[/i][i]

- She is silent killer -Light Foot (she wont trigger traps), also Backstab  Stealth80%, Muffed Movement, Silence, Assassins Blade - perks.[/i][i]

- Agile Defender (she will Increase armor rating for Light armor by 80%)[/i][i]Additionaly - Custom Fit and Unhindered and WindWalker perks for Light Armor.[/i][i]

- She is skilled with bows  - Overdraw, Death Aim,  Critical Shot, perks included.[/i][i]

- UNPB-BBP body version.[/i][i]- HDT butt & breast physics.[/i][i]

- She LVL UP with player from 1 - 90lvl.[/i][i]

- She is marriageable[/i][i]

- She will be waiting for you in Riverwood Sleeping Giant Inn.[/i][i]- She will appear in game in her original clothes.(if not, then check README file.)

- [/i][i]Here is the links where you can get one of the best daggers for Mai - [color=#cc0000][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/16162/?]DAGGERS

[/url][/color][color=#efefef]She uses one of the default voice packs from Skyrim (no custom voice)[/color][color=#cc0000][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/16162/?]
[/url]﻿[/color][/i][i] -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/i]

[i]Additional Content.
[/i][i]-----------------------------[/i][i]
1. Original set of clothes. (version of clothes is also UNPB-BBP)
[/i][i]-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/i][i] 
If  she dont have any weapon at all, she will fight bare hands till she find any weapon that can be found near.
Warning ! If you dont give her any weapons but there will be a fight in some house or tavern she can steal any weapon she will see and rush in to the fight.
So if you care about not get a penalty that city can put for your head, dont start fight inside taverns or houses orgive Mai weapon before starting fight.
Remember she is a badass.

[/i][i]I hope you all enjoy this hard work i made.[/i]
[i]--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[/i][i]Requirements.
[/i][i]------------------------[/i][i]

This Follower required SKSE plugin installed (latest version)[/i][i]Latest Skyrim version. 
[/i][i]
Latest vers. of UFO is very recommended for her and for any of my
followers mods. They are working with UFO (Ultimate Follower Overhaul)
just great. This follower probably will be working good with any other mods similar to UFO.
[/i][i]
[/i][color=#cc0000][i]Also if you want HDT physics to work , you need to have HDT physics extention (latest or pre latest
version) installed before this mod.
My followers are very friendly with, Convenient Horses, The Dance Of Death, mods. Also i recommend Followers Stealth Kills mod.
[/i][/color][/size][i][color=#cc0000][size=4]IMPORTANT - [/size][/color][color=#cc0000][size=4]If you install this mod manually , after INSTALL you need to ACTIVATE 1 ESM and 1 ESP files in your SKYRIM LAUNCHER !!![/size][/color]
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[size=4]P.S. If you dont like it - it is simple - DONT download it ![/size]

[size=5]If you want alternative download options or want to see more of my followers for Skyrim , pls visit my website here - [/size][url=http://skyrimmods.wixsite.com/shadowdancer][size=5]ShadowDancer's Skyrim Mods [/size]
[/url]

[/i]
author: ShadowDancer777
